title: Align AGENTS.md and CLAUDE.md with upstream Beads docs
description:
## Requirements
- Add bd edit interactive command warning
- Add non-interactive shell command guidance (cp -f, mv -f, rm -f)
- Add merge conflict resolution for .beads/issues.jsonl
- Document debounce/sync mechanics
- Add bd dep / dependency commands
- Document priority scale (0-4)
- Document all bd update field flags
- Restructure toward lean bd prime pointer approach
- Fix commit format to parentheses (bd-xxx) for bd doctor orphan detection
- Add daemon management, bd stats, --json flag, bd close multi-ID

## Acceptance Criteria
- AGENTS.md contains all sections from upstream AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md and AGENTS.md that are relevant
- Commit format matches what bd doctor expects for orphan detection
- No content duplication with bd prime output
- bd doctor shows fewer warnings after changes
close_reason: Completed: aligned AGENTS.md and CLAUDE.md with upstream Beads docs, fixed hooks, gitignore, role config, daemon
